fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Outsider: You appear to not win with Order. Affects up to Uncertain checks. [Hidden]
- Deluded: You think you are an Order role, but are really a Heretic. You will appear to have all the regular abilities and passives of a normal Order role, except with these hidden passives.  You will learn of your true role if you live until N3. [Hidden]
- Dangerous: If the Order team wins and you are still alive, Order will lose and Chaos wins. If Chaos is 1 member away from complete elimination, everyone will be alerted there is a Heretic and you get 2 non-Specials of your choice. If this previous criteria is skipped, then your victory (if you would win) is extended by 1 phase and everyone is alerted there is a Heretic and you get 2 non-Specials of your choice. [Hidden, Activates N3] 
  - You will not steal the win unless Order has also killed any Outsiders they need to kill.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: You must assist Chaos in their victory. If Order wins and you are still alive, Chaos still wins. If Order somehow wins the game before N3, then you normally win with Order.
